sentences.introduction: Hello, I'm an full stack developer based in Turkey, Istanbul !
sentences.2018Text1: Completed İzmir Anadolu Lisesi (High School Degree)
sentences.2018Text2: Started ITU as a maritime engineering student
sentences.2020Text: Undergraduate transfer to physics engineering in ITU
sentences.2021Text: In September started working as Full Stack Developer at Gameflex
sentences.2023Text: In August started working as Mid-Level Developer at Chex
sentences.2024Text: I started working as a React Native developer at a stealth-mode startup in February. Additionally, I completed my undergraduate degree in June.
sentences.summary: I began developing myself in the field of web and software development in 2021, focusing particularly on the JavaScript ecosystem. Thanks to the experiences I gained through internships, projects, and school clubs, I started working full-time as a full stack developer in September 2021. I am currently working as a React Native developer at a stealth-mode startup.

todolist.name: Microsoft Todo List Clone
todolist.description: Microsoft todo list desktop app clone, there is no external css library for that project, styles written in pure css. Also it is not a pre written project from youtube or udemy tutorial

movieApp.name: Movie App
movieApp.description: A movie app for searching movies and criticize them out. App has authentication, account page. Also movie comments are real time triggered.

reduxCrudApp.name: Redux Crud App
reduxCrudApp.description: An app for crud purposes. Aim of this project was used to best practice redux toolkit and being familiar with state management of react.

galleryVue3.name: Gallery Vue 3(npm package)
galleryVue3.description: An npm package for handling images as gallery view in web apps. It is easy to use, lightweight and has simple implementation. Besides compatible with mobile.

etsyScraper.name: Etsy Scraper
etsyScraper.description: An app for scraping product data from etsy.com urls. From given url script scrapes product's image price and name than writes to MongoDB.

cryptoChatApp.name: Crypto Chat App
cryptoChatApp.description: An app for crypto currencies.  You can track prices for various periods and chat real time with other users.

cssConverter.name: Jsx To Css Converter (vscode extension)
cssConverter.description: An vscode extension that converts inline jsx styles to raw css codes.
